When New Orleans Police Detective Danny Fisher (John Cena) stops a brilliant thief running away with a multi-million dollar theft, the thief's girlfriend is accidentally killed. After escaping from prison, the criminal genius enacts his revenge, causing Danny with 12 rounds of charades and almost impossible task, he needs to complete anyway, to save the life of the woman he loves.
